
export PYTHON_ENV="development"
export API_PORT=8080
export WORKERS=10
export TIMEOUT=300
export LOG_FOLDER=/var/log/ml-project1

docker run -d \
  --rm \
  -p ${API_PORT}:80 \
  -e "WORKERS=${WORKERS}" \
  -e "TIMEOUT=${TIMEOUT}" \
  -e "PYTHON_ENV=${PYTHON_ENV}" \
  --name="${JOB_NAME}" \
  ${IMAGE}:${TAG}
